conbody.p: To receive long-tap events in your application using the Touch UI utilities API, follow the steps below:

li.p: Link the AVKON libraries avkon.lib and eikcoctl.lib to the project file of the application.
Provide an observer class that implements the MAknLongTapDetectorCallBack interface.
Create an instance of the class CAknLongTapDetector and pass pointer events to the long-tap detector.
Receive long-tap events through the observer interface.
